description:
To get things started, I propose to hold a re-run of my 2022 ACCU Presentation called: [How to Use C++20 Coroutines for Networking](https://youtu.be/ZNttI_WswMU) (the abstract is also available on the YouTube page).

Please note that the event will be held at the [Blu Wireless Bristol Office](https://www.bluwireless.com/contact-us/) and not at the Marriott (though the Blu Wireless Office is literally next to the hotel). The address is as follows:

Blu Wireless
4th Floor
One Castlepark
Tower Hill
Bristol
BS2 0JA

The talk will be followed by a trip to the Cornubia where the discussion can continue.

Hope to see you there !

Jim
title: How to Use C++20 Coroutines for Networking
